meanings.definition: A type of pastry or dessert made with almond cream and typically topped with fruit.
meanings.sent1: I baked delicious frangipanes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells frangipanes with various fruit toppings.
meanings.sent3: The frangipanes looked so good, they almost seemed too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her frangipanes were a work of art, each one a masterpiece of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked frangipanes filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.

meanings.definition: A fragrant tropical tree or shrub of the pea family, with clusters of sweet-smelling flowers.
meanings.sent1: The frangipanes in the garden attracted colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent2: The frangipanes blossomed beautifully in the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The frangipanes seemed to whisper secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The frangipanes stood tall and proud, their fragrance enchanting all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The frangipanes filled the air with a sweet perfume, making the garden a paradise.
